TITLE.P: Framework Contract for the supply of institutional office and field materials (2022-2024)

SHORT_DESCR.P: The subject of the framework contract is the supply by the Contractor of the following goods:

The supplies are to be provided in 2 incoterms - FCA supplier warehouse and DDP Intersos Humanitarian Aid Organization - Via Aniene, 26A - 00198 Roma RM and deliveries should start in no more than 10 days from the date of signature of the contract by the Contractor and based on submitted purchase orders and agreed delivery lead times.

LOT_COMBINING_CONTRACT_RIGHT.P: Contracts will be awarded lot by lot, but the Contracting Authority may select the most favourable overall solution after taking account of any discounts offered.

TITLE.P: Institutional Office Materials for office premises and all related activities

SHORT_DESCR.P: The supplies must comply fully with the technical specifications set out in the tender dossier (technical annex) and conform in all respects with the drawings, colours, quantities, models, samples, measurements and other instructions provided by the annex - INTERSOS Brand Identity Manual.
1.3 Tenderers are not authorised to tender for a variant solution in addition to the present tender.

1.4 A Framework Contract will be signed between INTERSOS and the Contractor after the closing of the tender until 31st of December 2024.Within the contract duration and according to its operational needs, INTERSOS reserves the right to purchase only a part of the listed items in different times and specify the requested quantities of supplies without variation in the unit price offered by your company. The total amount of the orders cannot exceed 600.000 EUR.

TITLE.P: Field Institutional Material for field premises and all related activities

SHORT_DESCR.P: The supplies must comply fully with the technical specifications set out in the tender dossier (technical annex) and conform in all respects with the drawings, colours, quantities, models, samples, measurements and other instructions provided by the annex - INTERSOS Brand Identity Manual.
1.3 Tenderers are not authorised to tender for a variant solution in addition to the present tender.

1.4 A Framework Contract will be signed between INTERSOS and the Contractor after the closing of the tender until 31st of December 2024.Within the contract duration and according to its operational needs, INTERSOS reserves the right to purchase only a part of the listed items in different times and specify the requested quantities of supplies without variation in the unit price offered by your company. The total amount of the orders cannot exceed 600.000 EUR.

SUITABILITY.P: Tenderers must submit a signed declaration, included in the Tender Form for a Supply Contract, to the effect that they are not in any of the exclusion situations. Tenderers included in the lists of donors restrictive measures at the moment of the award decision cannot be awarded the contract.

Participation is open to all natural and legal persons (participating either individually or in a grouping - consortium - of tenderers). Criteria for legal persons: 1- Having a professional certificate appropriate to this contract, such as Declaration of conformity, Material Safety Data Sheets, TCO certified is considered as an advantage.
